author: Rhosius

text:
@Dracowrath1 
Even if it wasn't x-box exclusive, I doubt it would have made as much as FFXIII.  LO is the better game by far but, fact is, a new IP just can't compete against a well-known one.  Think about it, how long did it take the Final Fantasy series to get to the point where it was selling over a million copies?  Also, even though I personally love JRPGs, the genre just isn't that popular with newer gamers.  Unless you're a well known series like the FF series, you probably won't sell.

text: @LinkEX I don't know~ Mistwalker saying they've cancelled ideas of making sequels to this game and pretty much seen as a financial loss to the company could be a sign of what I mean. It's arguably one of the last great epic RPGs of the decade. Definitely did not get what we got from LO from FFXIII. Yet that game made more than 5x what this did. Gamers whined to SE about nonlinear gameplay in that game, yet when games like LO fail like this, who can blame them for making FFXIII what it was?
